bigNews.author: Creed Bratton
bigNews.title: Obama Offers Hopeful Vision While Noting Nation’s Fears

bigNews.author: Creed Bratton
bigNews.title: Didi Kuaidi, The Company Beating Uber In China, Opens Its API To Third Party Apps
bigNews.news: One day after Uber updated its API to add ‘content experiences’ for passengers, the U.S. company’s biggest rival — Didi Kuaidi in China — has opened its own platform up by releasing an SDK for developers and third-parties.

bigNews.author: Alexandre Henrique Shailesh Zeta-Jones
bigNews.title: NASA Formalizes Efforts To Protect Earth From Asteroids
bigNews.news: Last week, NASA announced a new program called the Planetary Defense Coordination Office (PDCO) which will coordinate NASA’s efforts for detecting and tracking near-Earth objects (NEOs). If a large object comes hurtling toward our planet…

othersNews.author: Creed Bratton
othersNews.title: For Some Atlanta Hawks, a Revved-Up Game of Uno Is Diversion No. 1
othersNews.news: The favored in-flight pastime of a group of players including Al Horford, Kent Bazemore and Dennis Schroder is a schoolchildren’s card game with some added twists.

othersNews.author: Creed Bratton
othersNews.title: Picking a Windows 10 Security Package
othersNews.news: Oscar the Grouch has a recycling bin and Big Bird has moved to a tree as the children’s classic debuts on HBO, aiming at a generation that doesn’t distinguish between TV and mobile screens.

othersNews.author: Creed Bratton
othersNews.title: As U.S. Modernizes Nuclear Weapons, ‘Smaller’ Leaves Some Uneasy
othersNews.news: The Energy Department and the Pentagon have been readying a weapon with a build-it-smaller approach, setting off a philosophical clash in the world of nuclear arms.
